headline: Kimberly-Clark to Webcast its Presentation at Barclays 18th Annual Global Consumer Staples Conference
summary: Mike Hsu, Chairman and CEO of Kimberly-Clark Corporation (NASDAQ: KMB), Russ Torres, President and Chief Operating Officer and Nelson Urdaneta, Chief Financial Officer will be a featured speakers at the Barclays 18th Annual Global Consumer Staples Conference on Wednesday, September 3, at 8:15 a.m. ET.
